content: all other pieces are attached to the main body the knots and loose ends from the crazy yarn will fall to the back of your work the sample shown has the reverse side of the stitches facing the outside of the toy for added interest all pieces are worked in spirals do not join the rounds use your stitch marker to keep track of the beginning of each round most pieces are worked with two strands of yarn held together and worked as one the only exception to this is the horns pattern begins body begin at base of body start with 5 mm hook us 8 use mc fushia and the crazy yarn to make an amr round 1 chain 1 6 single_crochet into ring tighten tail 6 single_crochet round 2 2 single_crochet in each st 12 single_crochet round 3 * 2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet repeat from * around 18 single_crochet round 4 * 2 single_crochet in next st 2 single_crochet repeat from * around 24 single_crochet round 5 * 2 single_crochet in next st 3 single_crochet repeat from * around 30 single_crochet round 6 * 2 single_crochet in next st 4 single_crochet repeat from * around 36 single_crochet round 7 single_crochet around 36 single_crochet create leg openings the chain 6 loops in round 8 will later accommodate the legs round 8 chain 6 skip next 6 st 4 single_crochet chain 6 skip next 6 st 20 single_crochet 24 single_crochet 2 chain 6 loops round 9 single_crochet in each st around 36 single_crochet rounds 10 - 13 single_crochet around 36 single_crochet decide examine each side of the work and decide which will become the outside of your toy the sample shown has the wrong side of the fabric on the outside as this is the most textured and interesting surface round 14 * 4 single_crochet invdec repeat from * around 30 single_crochet round 15 single_crochet around 30 single_crochet round 16 * 3 single_crochet invdec repeat from * around 24 single_crochet round 17 single_crochet around 24 single_crochet round 18 * 2 single_crochet invdec repeat from * around 18 single_crochet rounds 19 22 single_crochet around 18 single_crochet fasten_off leave a 20 cm 8 in tail of mc fuschia for seaming inner beast - by sharon maher of laughing purple goldfish designs ©2017 legs make 2 the legs are worked directly onto the body where the two chain 6 holes were created in round 8 ensure the chosen side of the work is facing outwards to match the body start work 12 single_crochet around the inside of the first leg opening rounds 2 - 12 single_crochet around 12 single_crochet round 13 2 single_crochet in each st 24 single_crochet rounds 14 - 15 single_crochet around 24 single_crochet fasten_off leave a 20 cm 8 in tail of mc fuschia for seaming repeat repeat process to create second leg stuff stuff the body firmly through the neck opening lightly stuff the narrow part of each leg through the foot opening seam seam between
